long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Nightly Wallet is a multi-chain wallet created to embrace the full potential of blockchain. It includes Nightly Wallet - an extension and mobile wallet working on Solana, Near, Aptos, Sui, Movement and others !

Wallets are the beginning of every crypto journey. We provide the best possible integrations on each of these chain. Dive into the world of multichain with Nightly and embrace its true potential.


Nightly is built by experienced Web3 degens - we know the problems and struggles of crypto users, so we decided to take problems into our own hands and develop real solutions.

Download it now!
